name: Bat Rider
description:
Made for but not submitted to Divination Jam 2019, Bat Rider was my first Bitsy project. I loved making pixel art and got really carried away with the animations. Every color palette was auto-generated using this tool, and I was given the narrative of the game through a reading with the Pamela Coleman Smith-illustrated "Rider-Waite" Tarot deck. I even drew a card to decide how many scenes the game should have. 

It's a bit Holy Mountain, but why wouldn't it be?
